channel.title: Airlines on Cassandra & Michael Wedding

item.title: Airline Travel
item.description: Airports St. Louis Lambert International Airport (STL) 10701 Lambert International Blvd, St. Louis, MO 63145 Website: https://www.flystl.com/ The St. Louis Airport is approximately 111 miles (or 1 hour and 42 minutes) from the wedding venue. While there is a shuttle service to and from Columbia for a reasonable fare, we recommend renting a car for your convenience. Rental Cars from Lambert International Airport https://www.flystl.com/parking-and-transport/rental-cars Kansas City International Airport (MCI) Kansas City, MO 64153 Website: http://www.
